title: IT-Vision 2025
description: Join us for IT-Vision 2025, Pakistan's Biggest Tech and Career Exhibition. Where Innovation meets oppurtunity.

title: Literature Festival
description: A two-day festival bringing together renowned writers, poets, artists, and intellectuals, alongside sessions with celebrities.

title: Sports Festival
description: A week-long event featuring various sports competitions, promoting physical fitness and team spirit among students.

title: Cracking Clerkships
description: A webinar hosted by LUMS, focusing on the application process for judicial clerkships in Pakistan.

title: Open Mic
description: An event providing a platform for students to showcase their talents in music, poetry, and other performing arts.

title: TechFest 2025
description: Annual tech festival with coding competitions, robotics contests, and AI workshops.
